# Read in MacArthur group processed clinvar data
```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
clinvar_single <- fread('gzcat ~/git/clinvar/output/b37/single/clinvar_alleles.single.b37.tsv.gz')
```

# ID RD specific pathogenic variants
```{r}
clinvar_single %>% filter(pathogenic > 0| likely_pathogenic > 0) %>% filter(conflicted=='0') %>% filter(grepl('stargardt|retina|leber|usher|cone-rod|rod-cone|macular|retinitis', all_traits, ignore.case=T))
```
